"Lisa":
"Well, did you enjoy slaughtering those
hostiles with twin machineguns?"

"Twin machineguns and Gunners are
made for each other! Do you think you
got a good feel for them?"

"I really love how you can get up
close and really watch them bleed
and suffer. Hee hee!"

"Oh sorry, were you busy tormenting
hostiles? Forgive me if I got in the way."

"Well, that's about it. I hope you'll
come back with a long list of kills!
Okay then! Off you go!"
